name.description: guild name (2-100 characters, excluding trailing and leading whitespace)

icon_hash.description: icon hash, returned when in the template object

discovery_splash.description: discovery splash hash; only present for guilds with the "DISCOVERABLE" feature

owner.description: true if the user is the owner of the guild
owner.note-field: These fields are only sent when using the GET Current User Guilds endpoint and are relative to the requested user

permissions.description: total permissions for the user in the guild (excludes overwrites)
permissions.note-field: These fields are only sent when using the GET Current User Guilds endpoint and are relative to the requested user

region.description: voice region id for the guild (deprecated)
region.note-field: This field is deprecated and is replaced by channel.rtc_region

widget_enabled.description: true if the server widget is enabled

widget_channel_id.description: the channel id that the widget will generate an invite to, or null if set to no invite

verification_level.description: verification level required for the guild

mfa_level.description: required MFA level for the guild

application_id.description: application id of the guild creator if it is bot-created

system_channel_id.description: the id of the channel where guild notices such as welcome messages and boost events are posted

rules_channel_id.description: the id of the channel where Community guilds can display rules and/or guidelines

max_presences.description: the maximum number of presences for the guild (null is always returned, apart from the largest of guilds)

max_members.description: the maximum number of members for the guild

vanity_url_code.description: the vanity url code for the guild

premium_subscription_count.description: the number of boosts this guild currently has

preferred_locale.description: the preferred locale of a Community guild; used in server discovery and notices from Discord, and sent in interactions; defaults to "en-US"

public_updates_channel_id.description: the id of the channel where admins and moderators of Community guilds receive notices from Discord

max_video_channel_users.description: the maximum amount of users in a video channel

approximate_member_count.description: approximate number of members in this guild, returned from the GET /guilds/<id> endpoint when with_counts is true

approximate_presence_count.description: approximate number of non-offline members in this guild, returned from the GET /guilds/<id> endpoint when with_counts is true

welcome_screen.description: the welcome screen of a Community guild, shown to new members, returned in an Invite's guild object

premium_progress_bar_enabled.description: whether the guild has the boost progress bar enabled

approximate_member_count.description: approximate number of members in this guild

approximate_presence_count.description: approximate number of online members in this guild

instant_invite.description: instant invite for the guilds specified widget invite channel

channels.description: voice and stage channels which are accessible by @everyone

members.description: special widget user objects that includes users presence (Limit 100)

presence_count.description: number of online members in this guild

user.description: the user this guild member represents

joined_at.description: when the user joined the guild

premium_since.description: when the user started boosting the guild

deaf.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels

mute.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels

pending.description: whether the user has not yet passed the guild's Membership Screening requirements

permissions.description: total permissions of the member in the channel, including overwrites, returned when in the interaction object

communication_disabled_until.description: when the user's timeout will expire and the user will be able to communicate in the guild again, null or a time in the past if the user is not timed out

enabled.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

syncing.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

role_id.description: id that this integration uses for "subscribers"
role_id.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

enable_emoticons.description: whether emoticons should be synced for this integration (twitch only currently)
enable_emoticons.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

expire_behavior.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

expire_grace_period.description: the grace period (in days) before expiring subscribers
expire_grace_period.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

user.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

synced_at.description: when this integration was last synced
synced_at.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

subscriber_count.description: how many subscribers this integration has
subscriber_count.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

revoked.note-field: These fields are not provided for discord bot integrations.

application.description: The bot/OAuth2 application for discord integrations

icon.description: the icon hash of the app

bot.description: the bot associated with this application

description.description: the server description shown in the welcome screen

welcome_channels.type: array of welcome screen channel objects
welcome_channels.description: the channels shown in the welcome screen, up to 5

description.description: the description shown for the channel

emoji_id.description: the emoji id, if the emoji is custom

emoji_name.description: the emoji name if custom, the unicode character if standard, or null if no emoji is set
